thread.title: Police find dogs at an animal fight club in Tenerife
thread.title_full: Police find dogs at an animal fight club in Tenerife

title: Police find dogs at an animal fight club in Tenerife
text: show ad Saved from a brutal death in the fighting pits: Police rescue 230 dogs from animal fight club run by Tenerife crooks Footage from a helicopter using night vision showed officers converging on the house in Tenerife in the Canary Islands Officers discovered dog fights taking place organised by a criminal gang that engaged in drugs trafficking to finance their illegal activities Similar police operations linked to the Tenerife bust took place in other provinces including Murcia and Alicante The raid led to the arrest of 34 people and the seizure of 80 cannabis plants
